name: fire-hardened wooden arrow
description: This simple arrow has a fire-hardened point and fletching.  Stands a below average chance of remaining intact once fired.

name: field point wooden arrow
description: A simple arrow shaft with a crude arrowhead and fletching.  Useful for hunting small woodland creatures, or as a last ditch defense against zombies.  Stands a below average chance of remaining intact once fired.

name: small game arrow
description: A simple arrow shaft that has a wide, blunt head.  Useful for hunting small woodland creatures without splattering them all over the ground, but stands a below average chance of remaining intact once fired.

name: wooden arrow
description: A basic wooden arrow, it has a metal arrowhead and fletching.  It's lightweight, does some damage, and is so-so on accuracy.  Stands a below average chance of remaining intact once fired.

name: heavy fire-hardened arrow
description: This arrow is significantly sturdier than other wooden arrows.  It has a fire-hardened point and fletching.  Stands a good chance of remaining intact once fired.

name: heavy field point arrow
description: This arrow is significantly sturdier than other wooden arrows.  It has a crude field point head and fletching.  Stands a good chance of remaining intact once fired.

name: heavy wooden arrow
description: A heavy wooden arrow, it has a metal arrowhead and fletching.  It's much heavier than other wooden arrows, and as a result, it does more damage and flies straighter, resulting in better accuracy over a longer range.  Stands a good chance of remaining intact once fired.

name: sharpened metal arrow
description: This metal shaft has been roughly sharpened so that it has a crude point at the end.  Stands a very good chance of remaining intact once fired.

name: metal broadhead arrow
description: This metal arrow has fletching and a steel arrowhead.  Stands a very good chance of remaining intact once fired.

name: metal bodkin arrow
description: This metal arrow has fletching and a steel bodkin arrowhead for armor penetration.  Stands a very good chance of remaining intact once fired.

name: metal target arrow
description: This metal arrow has extra long fletching and a round, balanced arrowhead for extra accuracy, at the cost of some damage.  Stands a very good chance of remaining intact once fired.

name: carbon fiber arrow
description: High-tech carbon fiber shafts and 100 grain broadheads.  Very lightweight, fast, and durable.  Stands a great chance of remaining intact once fired.

name: explosive arrow
description: This arrow has a small IED strapped to its tip.  Horribly inaccurate, heavy, and bulky, not only does this contraption require expert hands to pull off a shot, it requires one to loose this with a small measure of confidence that the shooter won't be caught in the blast radius.

name: explosive arrowhead
description: This simple IED is designed to be attached to an arrow and detonate on impact.

name: flaming arrow
description: This arrow has a flaming rag wrapped around the shaft near the head.  You should shoot it soon before it burns your bow.

name: self bow
description: A primitive bow fashioned from a single piece of wood, made specifically for the person using it.  Weak and wildly inaccurate, it doesn't work that well, unfortunately...
//: Not exactly something that would have high resale value, I'm afraid.

name: short bow
description: Though not as powerful as the longbow, this bow is quicker and easier to draw, and can be used effectively by those of average strength.  Good for small game or the survivor on the go.

name: compound bow
description: A high-power bow with shaped cams and extra cables for high velocity shots that can be used effectively by fairly strong archers.  Currently set to a medium weight.

use_action.msg: You tighten the limbs, increasing the strength of the bow.

name: compound bow (high)
description: A high-power bow with shaped cams and extra cables for high velocity shots that can be used effectively by very strong archers.  Currently set to a high weight, and ready to cause some real damage - if you can draw it.

use_action.msg: You loosen the limbs, decreasing the strength of the bow.

name: compound bow (low)
description: A high-power bow with shaped cams and extra cables for high velocity shots that can be used effectively by average archers.  Currently set to a low weight, making it much easier to draw.

use_action.msg: You tighten the limbs, increasing the strength of the bow.

name: composite bow
description: A bow made from multiple materials for increased energy efficiency.  Complicated to make, but stronger than an all-wood short bow.

name: recurve bow
description: A modern bow that curves away from the archer at the tips for increased power, which can be used effectively by those of somewhat above-average strength.  Good and easy to use, but nothing special.

name: reflex bow
description: A bow with limbs that curve away from the archer near the riser for power.  Smaller than some bows, but decently powerful and quick.

name: hybrid longbow
description: A modernized, six-foot longbow that curves away from the archer at the tips for increased power.  It can be used effectively by those of somewhat above-average strength.  Designed for archers that appreciate the smoothness of a traditional longbow, but desire the superior power of a modern recurve.

name: longbow
description: A six-foot wooden bow that takes a fair amount of strength to draw.  It can be used effectively by those of somewhat above-average strength.  Used mainly in medieval England in wartime, but pierces zombie hide just as well as chainmail.

name: wooden greatbow
description: An extremely large and stiff longbow, made with enormous limbs and a thick string to take an immense amount of energy.  Takes incredible strength to draw.

name: compound greatbow
description: An extremely large and powerful compound bow, made with enormous limbs and a thick string to take an immense amount of energy.  Takes incredible strength to draw.

name: reflex recurve bow
description: A modernized bow that combines the traits from both the reflex and the recurve bows, with both limbs and tips curving away from the archer, and reinforced with composite materials.  This dramatically increases the power and requires significant strength to draw the bow effectively, but can still be fired quickly.

name: throwing knife
description: A thin and flat knife made for throwing.  Its ineffective cutting edge and odd shape makes it unsuitable for use as a tool.

name: throwing axe
description: A lightweight hatchet made for throwing.  Its ineffective cutting edge and light weight makes it unsuitable for use as a tool.

name: lawn dart
description: A large plastic dart made for outdoor games.

name: frisbee
description: A plastic frisbee made for outdoor games.

name: disc
description: A plastic disc made for playing disc golf, it is smaller and denser then a normal frisbee.

name: wooden fishing spear
description: An underwater fishing spear made from wood tipped with steel.  It's very light, but doesn't have much range.  Stands a below average chance of remaining intact once fired.

name: metal fishing spear
description: An underwater fishing spear made from metal.  It's light, but doesn't have much range.  Stands a very good chance of remaining intact once fired.

name: carbon fiber fishing spear
description: An underwater fishing spear made from carbon fiber.  It's very light, but doesn't have much range.  Stands a bad chance of remaining intact once fired.

name: plastic arrow
description: This plastic arrow has a plastic arrowhead and fletching.  Stands a good chance of remaining intact once fired.
